data.text: Magi e migepe mag yawuot Harun.
To Nadab kod Abihu notho motelone wuon-gi kendo ne gionge gi yawuowi; omiyo Eliazar kod Ithamar ema ne otiyo kaka jodolo.
Daudi nopogogi e migepe kaluwore kaka nopognigi tich kikonye gi Zadok ma nyakwar Eliazar kod Ahimelek ma nyakwar Ithamar.

Jotelo mang始eny nonwang始 e nyikwa Eliazar moloyo nyikwa Ithamar kendo nopog-gi kaluwore gi tichgi. Jotend anywola apar gauchiel nowuok kuom nyikwa, Eliazar to gi jotend anywola aboro nowuok kuom nyikwa Ithamar.
Negipogogi maonge dewo wang始 ka gigoyo ombulu nikech ne nitie jotelo mag kama ler mar lemo, to gi mag Nyasaye e kind nyikwa Eliazar kod Ithamar.

Jagoro Shemaya wuod Nethanel ma ja-Lawi nondiko nying-gi e nyim ruoth, to gi jotelo, ne gin Zadok jadolo, Ahimelek wuod Abiathar kod jotend anywola mag jodolo kod mag jo-Lawi ka gikawo ng始ato achiel koa e anywola mar Eliazar, to machielo koa e anywola mar Ithamar.
Ombulu mokwongo nolwar ne Jehoyarib,
mar adek ne Harim,
mar abich ne Malkija,
mar abiriyo ne Hakoz,
mar ochiko ne Jeshua,
mar apar gachiel ne Eliashib,
mar apar gadek ne Hupa,
mar apar gabich ne Bilga,
mar apar gabiriyo ne Hezir,
mar apar gochiko ne Pethahia,
mar piero ariyo gachiel ne Jakin,
mar piero ariyo gadek ne Delaya
Ma e kaka nochan-gi mondo giti kane gidonjo e hekalu mar Jehova Nyasaye kaluwore gi chike mane Jehova Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nochiko Harun kwargi.
Nyikwa Lawi mamoko e magi:
Koa kuom yawuot Rehabia noyier Ishia mokwongo.
Koa kuom Izhar noyier Shelomoth;
Yawuot Hebron mane oyier ne gin:
Wuod Uziel mane oyier ne en, Mika,
Owadgi Mika mane oyier ne en Ishia,
Yawuot Merari mane oyier ne gin: Mali kod Mushi.
Kuom yawuot Merari:
Koa kuom Mali noyier Eliazar mane ok onywolo yawuowi.
Koa kuom Kish, noyier wuod Kish miluongo ni Jeramel.
Koa kuom yawuot Mushi noyier Mali, Eder kod Jerimoth.

Gin bende negigoyo ombulu mana kaka jowetegi ma nyikwa Harun notimo e nyim Ruoth Daudi kod Zadok, Ahimelek kaachiel gi jotelo mag anywola mag jodolo kod jo-Lawi. Jomadongo notimnegi mana machalre gi jomatindo.
